Package core

Interface HlaMoonManager

  • public interface HlaMoonManager
    Manager used to manage HlaMoons.

    This class is ThreadSafe as defined by Java Concurrency in Practice, see jcip.net.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getHlaMoons

        java.util.List<HlaMoon> getHlaMoons()
        Gets a list of all HlaMoons within interest, both local and remote. The list is a copy that is allowed to be altered.
        Returns:
        a list of HlaMoons

      • getAllHlaMoons

        java.util.List<HlaMoon> getAllHlaMoons()
        Gets a list of all HlaMoons, both local and remote. HlaMoons not within interest are also included. The list is a copy that is allowed to be altered.
        Returns:
        a list of all HlaMoons

      • getLocalHlaMoons

        java.util.List<HlaMoon> getLocalHlaMoons()
        Gets a list of local HlaMoons within interest. The list is a copy that is allowed to be altered.
        Returns:
        a list of local HlaMoons

      • getMoonByHlaInstanceName

        HlaMoon getMoonByHlaInstanceName​(java.lang.String hlaInstanceName)
        Find a HlaMoon with the given HLA instance name. If none is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        hlaInstanceName - the HLA instance name of the HlaMoon to find
        Returns:
        the specified HlaMoon, or null if not found.

      • getMoonByHlaInstanceHandle

        HlaMoon getMoonByHlaInstanceHandle​(byte[] encodedHlaInstanceHandle)
        Find a HlaMoon with the given HLA instance name. If none is found, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        encodedHlaInstanceHandle - the encoded HLA instance handle of the HlaMoon to find
        Returns:
        the specified HlaMoon, or null if not found.

      • createLocalHlaMoon

        HlaMoon createLocalHlaMoon()
                    throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Creates a new HlaMoon, and sets all Create attributes.
        Returns:
        Returns a new local HlaMoon.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • createLocalHlaMoon

        HlaMoon createLocalHlaMoon​(java.lang.String hlaInstanceName)
                    throws HlaIllegalInstanceNameException,
                           HlaInstanceNameInUseException,
                           HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Creates a new HlaMoon with a specified HLA instance name, and sets all Create attributes.
        Parameters:
        hlaInstanceName - the HLA instance name to register for this instance
        Returns:
        Returns a new local HlaMoon.
        Throws:
        HlaIllegalInstanceNameException - if the name is illegal
        HlaInstanceNameInUseException - if the name is already in use
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • deleteLocalHlaMoon

        HlaMoon deleteLocalHlaMoon​(HlaMoon moon)
                    throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Deletes a local HlaMoon and removes it from the federation.
        Parameters:
        moon - The HlaMoon to delete
        Returns:
        the HlaMoon deleted, null if it did not exist.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

                           HlaTimeStamp timestamp)
                    throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Deletes a local HlaMoon and removes it from the federation with a specified timestamp
        Parameters:
        moon - The HlaMoon to delete
        timestamp - timestamp when the instance was removed.
        Returns:
        the HlaMoon deleted, null if it did not exist.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • deleteLocalHlaMoon

        HlaMoon deleteLocalHlaMoon​(HlaMoon moon,
                           HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
                    throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Deletes a local HlaMoon and removes it from the federation at a specified logical time.
        Parameters:
        moon - The HlaMoon to delete
        logicalTime - The logical time when the instance was removed.
        Returns:
        the HlaMoon deleted, null if it did not exist.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException - if the logical time is invalid
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • deleteLocalHlaMoon

        HlaMoon deleteLocalHlaMoon​(HlaMoon moon,
                           HlaTimeStamp timestamp,
                           HlaLogicalTime logicalTime)
                    throws HlaNotConnectedException,
                           HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException,
                           HlaInternalException,
                           HlaRtiException,
                           HlaSaveInProgressException,
                           HlaRestoreInProgressException
        Deletes a local HlaMoon and removes it from the federation with a specified timestamp at a specified logical time.
        Parameters:
        moon - The HlaMoon to delete
        timestamp - timestamp when the instance was removed.
        logicalTime - The logical time when the instance was removed.
        Returns:
        the HlaMoon deleted, null if it did not exist.
        Throws:
        HlaNotConnectedException - if the federate is not connected
        HlaInvalidLogicalTimeException - if the logical time is invalid
        HlaInternalException - on internal errors
        HlaRtiException - on exception from the RTI
        HlaSaveInProgressException - if a federation save is in progress
        HlaRestoreInProgressException - if a federation restore is in progress

      • addHlaMoonManagerListener

        void addHlaMoonManagerListener​(HlaMoonManagerListener managerListener)
        Add an HlaMoon manager listener.
        Parameters:
        managerListener - listener to add

      • removeHlaMoonManagerListener

        void removeHlaMoonManagerListener​(HlaMoonManagerListener managerListener)
        Remove an HlaMoon manager listener.
        Parameters:
        managerListener - listener to remove

      • addHlaMoonDefaultInstanceListener

        void addHlaMoonDefaultInstanceListener​(HlaMoonListener listener)
        Add a listener that will automatically be added to all instances of HlaMoon (Both local and remote). The listener is notified when any attribute of an instance of HlaMoon is updated. The listener is also called when an interaction is sent to an instance of HlaMoon. All listeners will automatically be removed when an instance is removed. This method is idempotent.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to add.

      • removeHlaMoonDefaultInstanceListener

        void removeHlaMoonDefaultInstanceListener​(HlaMoonListener listener)
        Remove a listener from the set of listeners that are automatically added to new instances of HlaMoon. Note: The listener will not be removed from already existing instances of HlaMoon. This method is idempotent.
        Parameters:
        listener - The listener to remove.

      • addHlaMoonDefaultInstanceValueListener

        void addHlaMoonDefaultInstanceValueListener​(HlaMoonValueListener valueListener)
        Add a valueListener that will automatically be added to all instances of HlaMoon (Both local and remote). The Valuelistener is notified when any attribute of an instance of HlaMoon is updated. Note that the attribute values that are notified are not guaranteed to be the latest available values for that attribute. All listeners will automatically be removed when an instance is removed. This method is idempotent.
        Parameters:
        valueListener - The valueListener to add.

      • removeHlaMoonDefaultInstanceValueListener

        void removeHlaMoonDefaultInstanceValueListener​(HlaMoonValueListener valueListener)
        Remove a valueListener from the set of listeners that are automatically added to new instances of HlaMoon. Note: The valueListener will not be removed from already existing instances of HlaMoon. This method is idempotent.
        Parameters:
        valueListener - The valueListener to remove.

      • setEnabled

        void setEnabled​(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the HlaMoon manager. The manager is enabled by default. The state can only be changed when not connected. When the HlaMoon manager is disabled it will act as disconnected, ie throws HlaNotConnectedException.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable the HlaMoon manager, otherwise false

      • setEnabledIfAvailableInFom

        void setEnabledIfAvailableInFom()
        Enables the HlaMoon manager if it is available in the FOM at runtime. The manager is enabled by default. The state can only be changed when not connected. When the HlaMoon manager is disabled it will act as disconnected, ie throws HlaNotConnectedException.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Check if the HlaMoon manager is actually enabled when connected. An HlaMoon manager may be disabled with the setEnabled(false) function, or it may be configured as if available in the FOM by the setEnabledIfAvailableInFom() function and then not available in the FOM at runtime.

        This method should only be used when connected, it will always return false when not connected.

        Returns:
        true if connected and the HlaMoon manager is enabled.
